did.unittitle: Ben Ali Theatre (movie theater), 121 East Main, interior, lobby; 7 foot "robot" nicknamed "The Iron Man" used to promote films, standee reads: "Ask The Iron Man about these pictures coming to the Ben Ali soon", noted are "Scarlet Down" (1932), "Flesh" (1932), "Uptown New York"(1932), "Fast Life"(1932), "Strange Interlude"(1932), and "I Am A Fugitive" (presumably "I Am A Fugitive From A Chain Gang" (1932)
